sections.heading: THE PRIVILEGE ON SHIPS AND MERCHANDISEArt
sections.text: 3237. Privileges on ships and vessels, enumeration and ranking; prescription.The following debts are privileged on the price of ships and other vessels, in the order in which they are placed:1. Legal and other charges incurred to obtain the sale of a ship o
